title: Portfolio Website
details: This project is a React-based portfolio site styled with Tailwind CSS. It showcases my work, skills, and contact info. Features include responsive design, filterable projects, and smooth scrolling navigation.

title: F1 Strategy Predictor
description: Predicts F1 race strategies with GPU-accelerated ML and Monte Carlo simulation
details: This project predicts and compares Formula 1 race strategies using historical data, machine learning, and Monte Carlo simulation. It uses GPU‐accelerated XGBoost and integrates official F1 rules like tyre usage limits and parc fermé constraints.

title: Django Markdown Blog
description: A Django-based blog engine using Markdown files.
details: This project is a blog engine built with Django where posts and pages are written in Markdown. It supports metadata front matter, simple CMS-like structure, tag support and is easy to deploy and maintain.

title: React Data Dashboard
description: A dynamic, customizable dashboard built with React, React Grid Layout, and Tailwind CSS.
details: This dashboard allows users to add, remove, and rearrange widgets such as tables and charts. It features drag-and-drop grid layout, dynamic data tables with selectable columns, dropdown menus for column selection, and a responsive design that adapts to all screen sizes.

title: MERN Task Manager
description: A full-stack task manager application built with the MERN stack.
details: This application allows users to create, read, update, and delete tasks. It includes features such as task prioritization, due dates, completion status, and user authentication. The frontend is built with React and styled using Tailwind CSS, while the backend is powered by Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

title: Go URL Shortener
description: A simple URL shortener built with Go, Gin, and GORM.
details: This project allows users to shorten URLs, redirect short URLs to original URLs, and includes user authentication with registration and login features. It utilizes JWT for authentication and bcrypt for password hashing.

title: URL Shortener
description: A simple URL shortener built with Flask and a front-end HTML/CSS/JavaScript.
details: This project provides a RESTful API that allows users to shorten long URLs and retrieve the original URLs using the shortened version. The back-end is built with Flask, and the front-end is implemented using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Microblog
description: A simple microblogging web application built with Python and Flask.
details: This application allows users to register, log in, create posts, and interact with other users through upvotes and downvotes. It includes features such as user authentication, post creation with titles and content, sorting posts by recency or votes, and dark mode support.

title: Twitter ChatGPT Sentiment Analyzer
description: A Python application that scrapes recent tweets about ChatGPT, performs sentiment analysis, and provides an interactive dashboard.
details: This project uses the Tweepy library to collect tweets mentioning 'ChatGPT', excluding tweets from OpenAI developers. It then analyzes the sentiment of these tweets using TextBlob and displays the results in a Streamlit-based dashboard. Users can filter tweets by sentiment type.
